com.bric.plaf

Class BasicSpinningProgressBarUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.ProgressBarUI
        • com.bric.plaf.SpinningProgressBarUI
          • com.bric.plaf.BasicSpinningProgressBarUI

  • public class BasicSpinningProgressBarUI
extends SpinningProgressBarUI
    Two spinning arrows.

    The arrows are painted in the component's foreground color. (When this UI is installed the component's foreground color is set to Color.darkGray.)

    Also the arrows will complete a full revolution in 2000 milliseconds. You can change this rate with the client property "period". This is the length (in milliseconds) this UI takes to complete a full cycle.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_PERIOD

        public static final java.lang.Long DEFAULT_PERIOD
        The default duration (in ms) it takes to complete a cycle.
        You can customize this by setting the client property "period" to an arbitrary positive number.

        paintForeground in class SpinningProgressBarUI
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics to paint to.
        jc - the component to paint.
        size - the dimensions to paint to. Assume these are the dimensions of the component you are painting (the Graphics2D has been transformed to work within these dimensions).
